summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5639 for the improvement of 1st Avenue North, from Republican Street to Mercer Street, by widening the existing pavement and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74353, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
